questions.question_text: Sarvam idam hi _________-labhyate nishchitam janaihi । Atah sadaiva satsangah karaṇīyo mumukṣhubhihi ॥ 5 ॥
questions.explanation: From Satsang Diksha Shlok 5: Sarvam idam hi satsangāl-labhyate nishchitam janaihi । Atah sadaiva satsangah karaṇīyo mumukṣhubhihi ॥ 5 ॥

questions.question_text: “...ati sāche bhāve karīne satsang kare to tene koī jātno doṣh haiyāmā rahe nahī ane deh chhatā ja brahmarūp thaī jāy.”
questions.explanation: This quotation is from Vachanamrut Sārangpur 9.

questions.question_text: “...jyāre āvo sant-samāgam prāpt thayo tyāre deh mūkīne jene pāmavā hatā te to deh chhatā ja maḷyā chhe; māṭe jene parampad kahīe, mokṣh kahīe tene chhate dehe ja pāmyo chhe.”
questions.explanation: This quotation is from Vachanamrut Gadhada Antya 2.

questions.question_text: Bhagwāne kahyu chhe je, “Jevo hu satsange karīne vash thāuchhu evo tap, yagna, yog, vrat, dānādik _________ karīne paṇ vash nathī thāto.”
questions.explanation: From Swamini Vato 1/17: Bhagwāne kahyu chhe je, “Jevo hu satsange karīne vash thāuchhu evo tap, yagna, yog, vrat, dānādik sādhane karīne paṇ vash nathī thāto.”

questions.question_text: Jan pratye jīvan kahe, jene jeṭalo satsang; Tene teṭalā pāpno, thāy bāher bhītar bhang.
Ā badhu satsang karavāthī avashya ________ thāya chhe. Āthī mumukṣhuoe sadāya satsang karavo.
questions.explanation: From Satsang Diksha Shlok 5 translation: Ā badhu satsang karavāthī avashya prāpta thāya chhe. Āthī mumukṣhuoe sadāya satsang karavo.

questions.question_text: Te satsang shu je, ‘Moṭā Ekāntikne hāth joḍavā ne te kahe tem ________ e ja chhe.’
questions.explanation: From Swamini Vato 1/17: Te satsang shu je, ‘Moṭā Ekāntikne hāth joḍavā ne te kahe tem karavu e ja chhe.’

questions.question_text: Tene teṭalā pāpno, thāy ________ bhītar bhang.
questions.explanation: From Bhaktachintamani 84: Tene teṭalā pāpno, thāy bāher bhītar bhang.

questions.question_text: “Jevo hu satsange karīne vash thāuchhu evo tap, yagna, yog, vrat, dānādik sādhane karīne paṇ vash nathī thāto.”
questions.explanation: This quotation is from Swamini Vato 1/17.

questions.question_text: ...ati sāche bhāve karīne satsang kare to tene koī jātno doṣh haiyāmā rahe nahī ane deh chhatā ja ________ thaī jāy.
questions.explanation: From Vachanamrut Sarangpur 9: ...ati sāche bhāve karīne satsang kare to tene koī jātno doṣh haiyāmā rahe nahī ane deh chhatā ja brahmarūp thaī jāy.
